name: Medium-Heavy Baitcasting Rod
description: A versatile rod for targeting strong, aggressive fish with precision and control.
purpose: Designed for power techniques using spinnerbaits, jigs, and topwater in heavy cover.
pros: Ideal for flipping, pitching, and pulling from cover
cons: Heavier weight can tire the angler
techniques: Pair with baitcasting reel and 15–20 lb line
Use near structure with spinnerbaits or frogs
Quick hookset and steady pull to land fish fast
whisper: The rod teaches control in power — strength must be directed, not scattered.
